attributes.action: Pay off all student debt for student nurses.
attributes.additional_details:
I can't imagine what it must be like to go to work every day with the constant threat of death.
The risk is also extended to the families of nursing staff and to their mental health and wellbeing.
A round of applause is just not enough for what these prople are going through for us.
attributes.background:
Any nurse who works during the current crisis should have their student debt paid by the UK government as a sign of how much we are indebted to them.
This would be something tangible by way of thanks from the people of the country.
